entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update SQL Connection String in Blazor WASM Connection to `DataSource=<value>` #42635
  • Blazor WASM Hot Reload not working; "General Exception This error was not expected, your process might be corrupted..." #42634
  • Publishing Blazor Linux creates SHA-256 failures #42633
  • dotnet 6 angular template does not work out of the box #42632
  • ARC App Service cannot authenticate to AAD #42631
  • AddRazorSupportForMvc in RCL stops runtime compilation but without it no partial views are published on Release #42629
  • Scoped CSS import order is incorrect #42626
  • lowercase url configuration in .net 6 razorpages lacking capability #42625

Closed

  • cannot be packaged staticwebassets.pack.json not found #42200
  • Unable to access created Subfolder or razor page under page in ASP.NETCore #42540
  • [Blazor] Support state within NavigationManager #42617
    7.0-preview7
  • [SignalR] Performance issue: SendAsync randomly slow #42376
  • Blazor Server `FetchData` Page Missing `Authorize` Attribute #42615
    Backlog
  • repeat audience property will be generate during using JwtSecurityToken class #42609
  • WebASM-Blazor slices #42622
  • You plan to use TagHelper in Blazor #42607
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularForgotPassword_ScreenReader: No asterisk marks are provided for the required fields #42337
    7.0-preview7
  • JwtBearer authn scheme is reading signing key from configuration root rather than scheme section #42450
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1868710 #42636
    area-mvc
  • Implement code fixer to change the code from calling Configure methods to using builder.Configuration #42630
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • [Blazor] Support state in NavigationManager #42534
    area-blazor, api-approved, 7.0-preview7
  • Fix up signing key handling in user-jwts and runtime #42603
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS from 2.2.0 to 2.2.6 in /src/Servers/IIS/IIS/test/testassets/InProcessNewShimWebSite #42624
    area-runtime, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, .NET
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Remove Pseudo-Headers From Public API #42496
    area-runtime
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Throw from OnConnected and OnDisconnected when using client results #42447
    area-signalr
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime
  • refactor : use new `ThrowIf` overload of `ObjectDisposedException` #42613
    area-blazor, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add gRPC trimming end-to-end test #42572
    area-grpc
